page.title: 20Kimbolton - Conclusion
page.content: It is easier to see where Kimbolton has come from than where it is going to.The immediate future looks prosperous because of the expansion already described.However,there are two anxieties that gnaw.First,the population is growing top-heavy with mobile middle-class families:the two or three generation roots of the old community are being shaken by the gradual disappearance of its children in search of the jobs and cheap houses that scarcely exist here.Second,the village is very dependent on the school,the future of which is to some degree politically vulnerable. {Credits}This material was assembled by Form One Q (age 11-12) of Kimbolton School,organised and assisted by teachers David Blackburn,Denis Brophy,John Stratford.
